# Draft:Zee Cine Awards 2025

----

The Zee Cine Awards 2025 ceremony celebrated the best of Indian Hindi-language films of 2018. The ceremony was held on 17 May 2025 at the NSCI Dome in Worli, Mumbai. and was the first to be streamed online on ZEE5 from 6–8 June 2025. The main hosts of the event were Vikrant Massey and Aparshakti Khurana.
